data.name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel IV - Headwear Set
data.detailed_description:
A set of accessories that'll let you adorn your noggin with all sorts of wild new fashion.

Ozzie Head x 10
Zan Su Head x 10
Achtzen Head x 10
Peacock Frames x 10
Rider Goggles x 10
Lovely Eyepatch x 10
Cutie Frames x 10
Swim Goggles x 10
Mishy Eye Mask x 10
Ultimate Sacrifice Ogre Mask x 10
Sunny Sun Visor x 10
Silver Sun Visor x 10

*These items can be claimed from the DLC tab on the Item page. After obtaining the items, they can be equipped from the Costume page on the Camp Menu.
